title: Frigorifico
body: The extinct Agricultural Board intended to establish a refrigeration plant in Funchal, acquiring a plot of land for this purpose between the old streets of Conceição and Hortas, now Correia Heredia and Alferes Veiga Pestana, for the amount of 10,500$00. The machinery for the same establishment cost 6,000$00 and in facilities, walls, opening of the communication between the two mentioned streets, etc., around 500,000 were spent until 1915. Despite being a facility capable of providing good services, the refrigeration plant never started operating, and in a session of the Agricultural Board on August 23, 1918, it was resolved to hand over to the Municipal Council the street where the buildings intended for it were constructed. (1921).

1918: Year of the resolution of the Agricultural Board
